markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Ectoplasmic Interstice](/Spells.aspx?ID=2410)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 269

**Domain**
[Soul](/Domains.aspx?ID=118)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Area** 15-foot [burst](/Rules.aspx?ID=2385)

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** [sustained](/Actions.aspx?ID=2317) up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You force the mortal [Universe](/Planes.aspx?ID=26) and [Ethereal Planes](/Planes.aspx?ID=34) to partially merge, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures. Within the area of effect, [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=632) creatures can’t pass through solid objects or corporeal creatures, and they can manipulate and attempt Strength-based checks against physical creatures and objects. An incorporeal PC or other creature with a normal Strength modifier simply uses that modifier, but if the creature had a Strength modifier of –5, like most incorporeal monsters, it uses a +4 modifier instead, increasing its [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) modifier by 9 accordingly. Attacks against creatures that are within the area overcome [resistances](/Rules.aspx?ID=2312) as if they were by [ghost touch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2840) weapons.
name: Ectoplasmic Interstice

summary: You force the mortal  Universe  and  Ethereal Planes  to partially merge, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures.
summary_markdown: You force the mortal [Universe](/Planes.aspx?ID=26) and [Ethereal Planes](/Planes.aspx?ID=34) to partially merge, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures.
text: Ectoplasmic Interstice Two Actions Source Divine Mysteries pg. 269 Domain Soul Range 30 feet Area 15-foot burst Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You force the mortal Universe and Ethereal Planes to partially merge, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures. Within the area of effect, incorporeal creatures can’t pass through solid objects or corporeal creatures, and they can manipulate and attempt Strength-based checks against physical creatures and objects. An incorporeal PC or other creature with a normal Strength modifier simply uses that modifier, but if the creature had a Strength modifier of –5, like most incorporeal monsters, it uses a +4 modifier instead, increasing its Athletics modifier by 9 accordingly. Attacks against creatures that are within the area overcome resistances as if they were by ghost touch weapons.
